scripts.git:setup: git init && git remote add origin https://github.com/janbee/talpakers.git && git branch -M main
scripts.git:deployToGHPages: npm run git:setup & npm --no-git-tag-version version patch && npm run build && npm run git:add && npm run git:commit && npm run git:push && npm run deploy
scripts.gen:domain: echo 'Enter Domain name in PascalCase' && read cmpName && npx generate-react-cli component $cmpName
scripts.gen:common:component: echo 'Enter Page name in PascalCase' && read cmpName && npx generate-react-cli component $cmpName --type=common
scripts.gen:hook:component: echo 'Enter Page name in CamelCase prefix with "use"' && read cmpName && npx generate-react-cli component $cmpName --type=hook
scripts.gen:page:component: echo 'Enter Page name in PascalCase' && read cmpName && npx generate-react-cli component $cmpName --type=page
